__TOC__

On <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/events/ubuntu-ca/1790/detail/|27 May 2012]]</nowiki> a small group of Ubuntu Enthusiasts met at <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/events/venues/Canada/215/detail/|Linuxcaffe]]</nowiki> to distribute Ubuntu 12.04 Precise Pangolin CDs.

<nowiki>[[http://identi.ca/notice/94052702|Arrived safely @linuxcaffe. With Gord Campbell, Sammy Lao, Larry and Bob Jonkman, geeking out over Ubuntu and !Linux]]</nowiki>

Our little stack of disks attracted all the right attention:

<nowiki>[[File:Ubuntu%20Toronto%20disks.jpg]]</nowiki>

<nowiki>[[http://identi.ca/notice/94053154|Giving away !Ubuntu 12.04 disks to complete strangers. Yay! #spreadingtheword @linuxcaffe !ubuntuca #ubuntuhour]]</nowiki>

Since Linuxcaffe no longer keeps a supply of Linux distributions, the CDs are now housed at <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/events/venues/Canada/786/detail/|FreeGeekToronto]]</nowiki>, where Sammy and the gang will be pleased to give you one.  

(but I did leave a small handful of CDs on the Linuxcaffe counter - hurry, before they're all gone!)

--Bob.
